= Introduction =

MobiMoon is a JavaME mobile application that displays Moon phase and Hijri date.


= Download File Guide =

All MobiMoon release download follows this convention :
_mobimoon-<release>.zip_

MIDP 1.0 releases append _-light_ at the end of the file name :
_mobimoon-<release>-light.zip_

Example :
  * mobimoon-1.0.zip
  * mobimoon-1.0-light.zip
